headline: Killing of 92-Year-Old Woman Rattles Queens Neighborhood
abstract: “It’s crazy that you could harm somebody like that,” said a neighbor in Queens.
lead_paragraph: It was hard to miss Maria Fuertes in her neighborhood. She was 92 years old and could be seen at all hours of day, shoulders hunched, slowly pushing her black cart filled with bottles and cans through the streets of South Richmond Hill, Queens.
